title: Facial trauma with life-threatening bleeding treated by andexanet alfa administration: A case report
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Yasunori Shirakawa, Naoto Jingami, Yoshitaka Ishiguro, Takuma Minami, Ken Shinozuka, Tomoyuki Yunoki, Shigeru Ohtsuru
